card1.title: Summer-tainment
card1.description: A website that details an activity we did over the summer to refresh our skills.

card2.title: Look Ma I'm Famous!
card2.description: A website that profiles an influential person born before the 20th century and describes their life.

card1.title: Magic 8-Ball
card1.description: A website that uses JavaScript to allow the user to input a question and receive a response, simulating a Magic 8-Ball.

card2.title: Mad Libs
card2.description: A website that uses JavaScript to create a Mad Libs experience for the user.

card1.title: On My Birthday...
card1.description: A website that uses JavaScript to update content on button clicks and presents historical events that occurred on the user's birthday.

card2.title: Rock Paper Scissors
card2.description: A website that allows the user to play Rock Paper Scissors against a JavaScript-controlled computer.

card1.title: Lucky Me Lottery
card1.description: A website that allows the user to input a list of names and randomly selects one.

card2.title: Future Me
card2.description: A website that describes a potential future career of the user.

card1.title: Super Team
card1.description: A website that uses loops over arrays of objects to generate and categorize a custom group.

card2.title: Little Bird Toy Company
card2.description: A website created in collaboration with a partner for a hypothetical company/client.
